nextcloud-zimlet-modern.title: Nextcloud
nextcloud-zimlet-modern.intro: Sign into your Nextcloud account to activate this feature. This enables saving email to Nextcloud.
nextcloud-zimlet-modern.saveNextcloudDescription: Choose a folder and filename to store the selected email and it's attachments to Nextcloud.
nextcloud-zimlet-modern.PropfindFailure: An error occurred while browsing Nextcloud
nextcloud-zimlet-modern.AttachFailure: An error occurred while attaching from Nextcloud
nextcloud-zimlet-modern.NoItems: No more items found in here.
